item.description:
The Open Theatre Project is excited to announce Acting Out Against Violence: An evening of Art, Performances, Silent Auctions, Community & more to benefit the ONE FUND. Currently we are seeking volunteers for the following positions & are hosting a meetup to discuss involvement on Wed June 5th | 6:30PM | Prudential Unlimited Realty 1290A Beacon St. Brookline, MA (this is not the performance, just a chance to plan ahead for the event)


The Performance is June 23rd : 4PM- 11PM with volunteers will be needed as early as 1PM that day.


Further details & task delegation will be discussed at the meet up, if you cannot make the planning day, please still reach out to Maya Attia at: maya@theopentheatre.com
Volunteer Descriptions:

  • 1-2 Stage Managers- help coordinate performers, schedules & more during the evening
  • 2 for Run Crew- help set up and tear town and other logistics during the evening.
  • 3 for Front of House -- collect tickets and direct people to where they need to go while answer basic questions about the event.
  • 4 for Silent Auction-- Supervise the space during the day
  • 5 Floating Volunteers-- Extra hands to help out wherever they are needed.
  • 1-2 Tech Volunteers -- To help set up performance gear throughout the evening.
  • Poster hangers-- we need several people to help cover ground around the Boston/ Brookline/Brighton/Allston and JP area!


Again, we will be hosting a meetup planning day on Wed June 5th | 6:30PM | Prudential Unlimited Realty 1290A Beacon St. Brookline, MA & the event itself will be on June 23rd. If you are interested in helping, please reach out to Maya Attia (maya@theopentheatre.com) immediately and visit : http://www.theopentheatre.com/actingout/ for more information!

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer Meeting for OTP's Acting Out Against Violence
